name: Galactic Mercy
description:
A short game for RNDGAME2020.

Interrogate the galactic terrorist to stop the galaxy from exploding.

I apologize for haphazard instructions - ran out of time.

There is definitely only one ending.

Exercise in Absurd.

Interrogator and her animations are from Mixamo.com

Mac build done blind. Apologies if it has issues.
